sn11.24:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhū sampayojesuṃ.
sn11.24:1.4: Atha kho so bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno santike accayaṃ accayato deseti;
sn11.24:1.6: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn11.24:1.7: “idha, bhante, dve bhikkhū sampayojesuṃ, tatreko bhikkhu accasarā.
sn11.24:1.8: Atha kho so, bhante, bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno santike accayaṃ accayato deseti, so bhikkhu nappaṭiggaṇhātī”ti.
sn11.24:2.2: Yo ca accayaṃ accayato na passati, yo ca accayaṃ desentassa yathādhammaṃ nappaṭiggaṇhāti—
sn11.24:2.5: Yo ca accayaṃ accayato passati, yo ca accayaṃ desentassa yathādhammaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti—
sn11.24:3.1: Bhūtapubbaṃ, bhikkhave, sakko devānamindo sudhammāyaṃ sabhāyaṃ deve tāvatiṃse anunayamāno tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi:
